ygData.subject: Re: Appearance question
ygData.msgSnippet: My Steel plate is a kinda pinky colour, no blue whatsoever (except my new Lambent Sleeves  8-)    that I got last night). My next task is to get the Lambent
ygData.messageBody:
My Steel plate is a kinda pinky colour, no blue whatsoever (except my new
Lambent Sleeves 8-) that I got last night).
My next task is to get the Lambent Boots (all I need now is Firewalker
boots). Then I shall get my greaves, I'm not sure if I'll get the helm
though.

Madagan, Bard of 27 songs!!




"Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...> on 11/11/99 18:23:50

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Appearance question




From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>

An appearance question for all you steel plate wearing wood-elf males out
there. What color is your steel plate tinged with? I am wearing the shin
greaves, which I thought would look just like plate, but I have never seen
anyone else with legs that are this color. They appear to be a rose tinged
silvery hue on me and ever since I put them on I constantly get "XXXXXX is
examining your equipment" or whatever that message is. The wood elf
females
I have seen in what looked like steel plate were blue tinged. Is this the
normal appearance of steel plate on wood elves? If the rose color is
normal
then I guess I have never seen any wood elves in steel plate on E'ci.

Kitasi

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
